
# EBook Store Application

Embark on a seamless eBook journey with this Firebase and Flutter-powered app. Browse, discover, and enjoy a diverse library hassle-free.


## Screenshots

![App Screenshot](https://camo.githubusercontent.)


## Tech Stack

**Client:** Flutter, Dart

**Server:** Firebase


## Features

- Pdf Reading
- Upload Book
- Delete Book
- Cross platform
- Update Book
- User Management
- Authentication


## Packages used

- cupertino_icons: ^1.0.2
- get: ^4.6.6
- flutter_svg: ^2.0.8
- syncfusion_flutter_pdfviewer: ^23.1.43
- lottie: ^2.7.0
- firebase_core: ^2.21.0
- google_sign_in: ^6.1.5
- firebase_auth: ^4.12.1
- fluttertoast: ^8.2.2
- file_picker: ^6.1.1
- cloud_firestore: ^4.12.2
- firebase_storage: ^11.4.1
- uuid: ^4.1.0
- image_picker: ^1.0.4
- flutter_launcher_icons: ^0.13.

## Run Locally

Clone the project

```bash
  git clone https://github.com/YashSah/E-BOOK-Store
```

Open the project in your preferred IDE 

Open terminal and run the following code

```bash
  flutter pub get
```

To run the app

```bash
  flutter run
```



![Logo](https://camo.githubusercontent.)
